trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<tr>" /> HTML element in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中的 <see langword="<tr>" /> HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<tr>` element represents a row in a table.
trans-unit.target: `<tr>`元素代表資料表中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class to programmatically control the `<tr>` HTML elements in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別以程式設計方式控制`<tr>`HTML 項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class allows you to customize the appearance of a row in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, and the height of the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別可讓您自訂資料表中的資料列的外觀，藉由指定資料列中的背景色彩、 框線色彩，以及儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性都使用設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Height%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can control the alignment of the contents in the cells for the entire row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以控制整個資料列儲存格的內容的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> property controls the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> property controls the vertical alignment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>屬性控制的儲存格內容的水平對齊時<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>屬性控制的垂直對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> collection of this class, you can programmatically access the individual cells in a row of a table.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>集合的這個類別中，您可以程式設計方式存取資料表的資料列中的個別資料格。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to control the properties of each cell, as well as the content.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您控制的每個資料格，為內容屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> instance to represent a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>表示中的資料列的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> is retrieved from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection of the table and its contents are modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>擷取自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>修改資料表和其內容的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object that represents the `<tr>` element for a table row.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式用來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>物件，代表`<tr>`資料表資料列的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The "tr" literal string.
trans-unit.target: 「 Tr"常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control with <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> controls and place the table on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>控制，並將資料表放在網頁上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中列之儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中列之儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>屬性來指定內容的水平對齊方式中的資料列的儲存格中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會影響資料表的執行個體所代表的資料列中的所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A> property for that cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要將對齊屬性套用至資料列的單一資料格，將<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>為該資料格屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that can be used for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of the cell with the left edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 對齊資料格的左邊緣與資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of the cell in the middle of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 中間的資料格的儲存格內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of the cell with the right edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 對齊資料格的右邊緣與資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用`Justify`和`Char`做為這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: However, not all browsers support these features.
trans-unit.target: 不過，並非所有瀏覽器支援這些功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> property to control the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>屬性來控制整個資料列儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the row represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 類別之執行個體所表示列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The background color of the row represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 的執行個體所表示列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A> property to specify the background color of the row represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A>屬性來指定執行個體所代表之資料列的背景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依名稱或使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位值，指定的色彩 （#），#RRGGBB 形式。

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 # 0000ff> 代表藍色的色彩。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它的最小值 (00) 給紅色和綠色的元件，而指定的藍色元件為指定的最大值 (FF)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: Color name
trans-unit.target: 色彩的名稱

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal value
trans-unit.target: 十六進位值

trans-unit.source: Aqua
trans-unit.target: 青色

trans-unit.source: #00FFFF
trans-unit.target: #00FFFF

trans-unit.source: Black
trans-unit.target: 黑色

trans-unit.source: Blue
trans-unit.target: 藍色

trans-unit.source: Fuchsia
trans-unit.target: 粉紅色

trans-unit.source: #FF00FF
trans-unit.target: #FF00FF

trans-unit.source: Gray
trans-unit.target: 灰色

trans-unit.source: Green
trans-unit.target: 綠色

trans-unit.source: Lime
trans-unit.target: 淺綠色

trans-unit.source: Maroon
trans-unit.target: 暗紅色

trans-unit.source: Navy
trans-unit.target: 海軍

trans-unit.source: Olive
trans-unit.target: 深黃色

trans-unit.source: Purple
trans-unit.target: 紫色

trans-unit.source: Red
trans-unit.target: 紅色

trans-unit.source: Silver
trans-unit.target: 銀級

trans-unit.source: #C0C0C0
trans-unit.target: #C0C0C0

trans-unit.source: Teal
trans-unit.target: 藍綠色

trans-unit.source: White
trans-unit.target: 白色

trans-unit.source: #FFFFFF
trans-unit.target: #FFFFFF

trans-unit.source: Yellow
trans-unit.target: 黃色

trans-unit.source: #FFFF00
trans-unit.target: #FFFF00

trans-unit.source: The available colors for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A> property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用可用的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A>屬性可由<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A> property to control the background color of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BgColor%2A>屬性，即可控制中的資料列的背景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the row represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 類別之執行個體所表示列的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The border color of the row represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 的執行個體所表示列的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A> property to specify the border color of the row represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>屬性來指定執行個體所代表之資料列的框線色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依名稱或使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位值，指定的色彩 （#），#RRGGBB 形式。

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 # 0000ff> 代表藍色的色彩。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它的最小值 (00) 給紅色和綠色的元件，而指定的藍色元件為指定的最大值 (FF)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: The available colors for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A> property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用可用的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A>屬性可由<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A> property to control the border color of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.BorderColor%2A>屬性，即可控制中的資料列的框線色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> objects that represent the cells contained in a row of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 物件的集合，這些物件會表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中列所包含的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection" /> that contains the cells of a row in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中列的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> collection to programmatically access the cells of a row in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>集合以程式設計方式存取資料列中的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add, remove, and insert cells in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您以程式設計方式新增、 移除和插入集合中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: If there are no cells defined in a row, an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何空白資料列中定義的儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>物件傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> collection to iterate through the cells of a row, represented by an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>集合來逐一查看資料列所代表的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>物件。

trans-unit.source: The cells are then updated with new content.
trans-unit.target: 資料格則會更新以新的內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 控制項建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 控制項的子伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.CreateControlCollection%2A> method creates a new <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> collection that is used to hold the row cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>用來保存資料列儲存格的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.CreateControlCollection%2A> method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.CreateControlCollection%2A> 方法主要是對控制項開發人員有利，可用以擴充 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> 控制項的功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of the row represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 類別之執行個體所表示列的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The height (in pixels) of the row represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 的執行個體所表示列的高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Height%2A> property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Height%2A>屬性，以指定的執行個體所代表之儲存格的高度 （以像素為單位）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: All cells in the row share the same height.
trans-unit.target: 資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cells in the row of a table, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定了太小，才能在資料表的資料列中顯示的資料格內容的高度，則會忽略這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Height%2A> property to control the height of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Height%2A>屬性，即可控制中的資料列的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，而不須自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體 (Entity)。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: Do not read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control with automatic conversion of special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，且自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: Do not read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType>引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 接收所呈現內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> control's child controls to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 控制項的子控制項呈現為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderChildren%2A> method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderChildren%2A>方法提供額外的格式之前和之後呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The additional formatting makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return and indenting before rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control's child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其他格式讓<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>控制項的呈現 HTML 容易讀取的傳回程式碼中新增並呈現之前縮排<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>控制項的子物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderChildren%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderChildren%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 接收所呈現內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> control's end tag.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 控制項的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderEndTag%2A> method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderEndTag%2A>方法提供額外的格式，在呼叫基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The added formatting makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing `<tr>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 加入格式化會使<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>控制項的呈現 HTML 更方便閱讀結尾之後加入一條線傳回`<tr>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderEndTag%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.RenderEndTag%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中列之儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中列之儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>屬性來指定內容的垂直對齊方式中的資料列的儲存格中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會影響資料表的執行個體所代表的資料列中的所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> property for that cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要將對齊屬性套用至資料列的單一資料格，將<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A>為該資料格屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that can be used for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 與儲存格的上邊緣的資料格內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 對齊資料格的中央儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 對齊資料格的下邊緣與資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用`BaseLine`做為這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: However, not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 不過，並非所有瀏覽器都支援這項功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> property to control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>屬性來控制整個資料列儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。
